mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEWS WHERE COMMENT_TEXT LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEWS (id, target_id, reviewer_id, rating_number, comment_text, created_at) VALUES (REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{targetId}, #{reviewerId}, #{ratingNumber}, #{commentText}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT i.title AS TITLE, u.nickname AS NICKNAME FROM reviews r JOIN items i ON r.target_id = i.id JOIN users u ON r.reviewer_id = u.id WHERE r.id = #{reviewId}
SELECT r.*, u.nickname AS reviewerName FROM reviews r JOIN users u ON r.reviewer_id = u.id WHERE r.target_id = #{targetId} ORDER BY r.created_at DESC
